other_tests.findings: Strong positive reaction on hours 48, 72, and 96 for cefadroxil in white petrolatum and in water; both placebos were negative.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Six months later, no relapse was observed.

other_tests.procedure_name: Puncture skin test using autologous serum
other_tests.findings: Mean wheal diameter was 10 mm with autologous serum and 2 mm with 0.9% saline.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After pretreatment with ketotifen (30 lg/kg), the response was abolished.
